> Concept ACK -- it's definitely a good thing if error assertions get more specific.
> Are there more assertion strings in the same file that could be improved in the course of this PR?

Actually quite a few of the`feature_segwit.py` tests just have "mandatory-script-verify-flag". I'm a beginner so was just looking to address comments I see, but definitely seems a good idea to see if  the ot

Thanks for these test improvements! The code looks good to me, but I have some stylistic suggestions- \n* The PR description gets added to the merge commit (you can check out [recent commits](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commits/master)).. so I'd recommend keeping it focused on describing the high level functionality of the PR. \n* Specific commit-level explanations can be on the commit me

Fixed named variables and added some for readability.\n\nAlso realized something that I should have fixed originally - changed the constant names from `WIT_V0` to `P2WPKH` and `WIT_V1` to `P2WSH`.  Doesn't change much, but adds some lines to the diff.
